channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Great House Giveaway
channel.desc: Simon gives sheepdog trainer Osian and quantity surveyor Elen the cash to buy, renovate and sell a house in north Wales. Can they turn their tired 1940s bungalow around in six months to make a profit.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Tool Club
channel.desc: The team build planters for the residents' allotment, and Julia and Ben make a sensory board. At the Tool Bus, a precious lamp gets a new lease of life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Farmers Country Showdown
channel.desc: Being launched at the Droitwich Food Festival are a Juneberry gin and Herefordshire-inspired crisps sold in environmentally friendly packets.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Royal Road Trip with Darcey Bussell
channel.desc: Darcey begins her royal road trip at the Highland Games in Balmoral, before sampling royal whisky and attempting a dance at the Ghillies Ball.

channel.title: The Great House Giveaway

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Martin Compston's Scottish Fling
channel.desc: Martin Compston and Phil MacHugh travel up the west coast of Scotland on an adventure to discover the different ways people experience the great Scottish outdoors.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Wartime Farm
channel.desc: The team must cope with the challenges which followed the 1943 slump in food imports. 6/8.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Lee and Chris are in Keynsham to design a Zen family space for Craig, Becky and their three boys.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Chris are in Cheadle to design a safe garden for pastor and PhD student Joy to relax, read, entertain, study and pray in.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Girl on a Motorcycle
channel.desc: This sixties cult classic sees a married woman leaving her husband, riding off on her prized motorbike to visit her lover. The late, great Marianne Faithful stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Groupie Girl
channel.desc: Sally runs away from her strict upbringing to become a rock band's groupie. A cautionary tale of hairy hippies and heartbreak. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Mary Millington
channel.desc: from the David Galaxy Affair. A playboy astrologer has to prove his alibi for a years-old robbery. With Mary Millington, Rosemary England and Diana Dors. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Hemel Hempstead to design a practical, usable family space for Lisa, Chris and their children. Last in series.

channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 1 / 12. Five archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in 1620. The team use oxen to plough, sow seeds by hand and prepare a Jacobean feast.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: School for Sex
channel.desc: Carry On-style comedy curio. A divorced man teaches girls how to swindle rich men - and in return he gets a cut of their takings. Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.
